categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: An attack on the gunrunner Praaelon Di was carried out by a group of bounty hunters and pirates at some point between 1 BBY and 3.5 ABY.

The attack on Praaelon Di first appeared in "Gunrunner," the opening installment in "Unfinished Business," a series of three scenarios for use with the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Miniatures game. The series was written by Sterling Hershey, and the first scenario was published on Wizards.com on February 22, 2007.
